LanguageData.PocketMapDisallowed: Pocket maps do not support stargate addresses.
LanguageData.GateDialFailed: Could not activate stargate: Receiving gate no longer exists or is currently in use.
LanguageData.CannotDialGateIsActive: Cannot dial: stargate is already active
LanguageData.RespawnGateString: Please respawn this gate (and its accompanying DHD) using devmode, as an update has broken it.
LanguageData.CannotWake: Cannot wake gate: Active gate already present.
LanguageData.CannotWake_SourceMap: Cannot wake gate on pocket map: Associated source map already possesses active gate.
LanguageData.GateHibernating: Built gate is hibernating: Conflict with existing, awake gate
LanguageData.GateHibernating_SourceMap: Built gate is hibernating: Conflict with existing, awake gate on pocket map's source map
LanguageData.GateHibernating: Address conflict: Gate in hibernation mode.
LanguageData.WakeHibernationDesc: Wake this stargate from hibernation, making it the active gate for this map.
LanguageData.OpenCloseIrisDesc: Open or close this stargate's iris.
LanguageData.CreateSGSiteDesc: Create a new stargate site at this location.
LanguageData.RenameGateSiteDesc: Rename this stargate site to a more recognizable name.
LanguageData.TransmitGDODesc: Transmit an identification code through the gate, identifying yourself and opening the iris on your stargate.
LanguageData.SelectConnectedGateDesc: View the gate on the other side of the wormhole connection.
LanguageData.SelectGateConflictDesc: View the active stargate that is preventing this gate from waking. Uninstall or deconstruct the awake gate to enable waking this gate.
LanguageData.CannotDecodeSGSymbols: Cannot decode: glyph deciphering not researched
LanguageData.ToggleablePatchesText: Optional patch-based settings from this mod can be found in the Vanilla Expanded Framework settings, under "Toggleable Patches"
